attributes.action: Disallow anyone becoming Prime Minister unless they have fought an election as a party leader and so stop an anti-democratic succession which does not reflect the view of the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is aimed at highlighting the opposition to having Prime Minister's foisted upon us without a general election.
It cannot be right that internal party politics can impose an individual as leader who will become Prime Minister when the electorate have not had their say,we believe that apart from emergencies(death in office etc)a Prime Minister should only hold office if an election has been fought and won by the leader of the party concerned or if an agreement can be reached for a coalition Government but an election should have been held beforehand.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
